thread.title: Bradley Cooper rolls up his sleeves for 'Burnt'
thread.title_full: Bradley Cooper rolls up his sleeves for 'Burnt'

title: Bradley Cooper rolls up his sleeves for 'Burnt'
text:
> Entertainment Bradley Cooper rolls up his sleeves for 'Burnt' FILE - In this Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015 file photo, Bradley Cooper, left, and Sienna Miller, attends the premiere of "Burnt" at the Museum of Modern Art, in New York. The movie opens nationwide on Oct. 30. (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
